'U' similar to latin U=V
'U' with clear n component ũ
'U' with clear r component uʳʴʵʶ

𐌿 similar to ո vu > vɔ/ɔ (ok որոշ = vɔˈɾɔʃ)

Obviously the full reading of 𐌿/ո was vn (vν=ոn!) even though the consonantic 'n' may have been a nonbinding feature such as 'zet' for the letter z, read von.

Herd heim house

Synthesis?

H component for free 𓉔

C component via casa 𓉔
𐍃𐌽𐌿𐍄𐍂𐍃 sanktros sage as a snake 𓋴𓆎𓅓𓁸 חָכָם | serpent:sapiens

V component
𐍅𐌴𐌹𐌽𐌰𐍄𐍂𐌹𐌿 weιnatrιu veιnatrιu Weintrau[be] grapevine

N component
𐌲𐌰𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌺𐌹 Gewinn…reich? gain, profit vs Gewerke @ work
𐍃𐌺𐌰𐌿𐌳𐌰𐍂𐌰𐌹𐍀𐍃 Skaũdarlops Sandalops sandal / strap
𐍃𐌺𐌿𐍆𐍄 Schniƒt:Schnitt hair vs Schopf
𐌺𐍂𐌹𐌿𐍃𐍄𐌹𐌸 grind (teeth)
𐌳𐌰𐌿𐌸𐌿 𓂧𓈖𓂧𓌪 > taunten > töten √death (kill/slaughter)

R component (weak case)
